{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which of the following are most sensitive to X-ray, we need to find information about the sensitivity of different tissues to X-ray radiation. Document [3] provides information about the relative susceptibility of cells, tissues, organs, or organisms to the harmful effects of ionizing radiation. Tumor cells, which are quickly dividing, are generally more sensitive to X-rays. However, this is not always true as tumor cells can be hypoxic and therefore less sensitive to X-rays.
